Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.presenter

Class JavaFxSnakePresenter

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.presenter.SnakePresenter
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.presenter.JavaFxSnakePresenter
public class JavaFxSnakePresenter extends SnakePresenter
A presenter for a JavaFX implementation of a snake game.

  • Method Details

    • initializeField

      public void initializeField()
      Initializes the presenter.

      Must be called before SnakePresenter.start().

    • runFramesUpdater

      protected void runFramesUpdater()
      Runs the Timeline which updates the game state and the view once per GameSpeed.getFrameDelayMillis() milliseconds, specified in SnakePresenter.getProperties().
      Specified by:
      runFramesUpdater in class SnakePresenter

    • stopFramesUpdater

      protected void stopFramesUpdater()
      Stops the timer which was started by SnakePresenter.runFramesUpdater().
      Specified by:
      stopFramesUpdater in class SnakePresenter

    • setScoreAmount

      protected void setScoreAmount(int scoreAmount)
      Sets the score amount to be displayed on the screen. Scoreboard is implemented as scoreAmountText JavaFx node.
      Specified by:
      setScoreAmount in class SnakePresenter
      Parameters:
      scoreAmount - score amount

    • drawApple

      protected void drawApple(Apple apple)
      Draws the apple on the screen. Sprite used is located at /sprites/apple.png.
      Specified by:
      drawApple in class SnakePresenter
      Parameters:
      apple - the apple to draw

    • drawBarrier

      protected void drawBarrier(Barrier barrier)
      Draws the barrier on the screen. Sprite used for each barrier point is located at /sprites/barrier.png.
      Specified by:
      drawBarrier in class SnakePresenter
      Parameters:
      barrier - the barrier to draw

    • drawPlayerSnake

      protected void drawPlayerSnake(Snake snake)
      Draws the player snake on the screen. Sprites used are located at /sprites/player/head.png and /sprites/player/tail.png.
      Specified by:
      drawPlayerSnake in class SnakePresenter
      Parameters:
      snake - the snake to draw

    • drawEnemySnake

      protected void drawEnemySnake(Snake snake)
      Draws the enemy snake on the screen. Sprites used are located at /sprites/enemy/head.png and /sprites/enemy/tail.png.
      Specified by:
      drawEnemySnake in class SnakePresenter
      Parameters:
      snake - the snake to draw
